column5: REQT Description
Allow students to register with a university-issued email address and create a secure account.
Implement secure credential-based login with session token management and automatic expiry.
Enable biometric authentication (Face ID / Touch ID) for returning users on iOS devices.
Provide password reset functionality via verified university email.
Allow all authenticated users to view and update their profile, contact details, and booking preferences.
Enable students to search and filter tutors by subject, availability, and rating.
Display a live availability calendar for each tutor showing open, booked, and blocked slots.
Allow students to reserve a tutor session slot and receive an instant booking confirmation.
Permit session cancellation or rescheduling within a defined policy window (e.g., 24 hours notice).
Allow students to search and filter study rooms by capacity, location, equipment available, and real-time availability.
Enable reservation of a room for a specified time block with confirmation receipt.
Provide QR-code check-in functionality for confirmed room reservations on arrival.
Display room details including photos, capacity, amenities, floor plan, and booking rules.
Provide a searchable equipment catalogue organised by category with real-time availability status.
Allow students to reserve equipment items with specified pickup and return time slots.
Send automated alerts to students for overdue equipment returns.
Send reminder notifications 24 hours and 1 hour before scheduled bookings.
Notify students of cancellations, slot changes, or admin-triggered booking modifications.
Allow users to configure notification preferences (push, in-app) in profile settings.
Provide an admin dashboard showing real-time resource utilisation across rooms, equipment, and tutors.
Allow admins to create, modify, and deactivate student and tutor user accounts.
Enable admins to approve, reject, or override any booking request across all resource types.
Maintain a full audit log of all admin actions, booking events, and system changes.
Allow students to submit a star rating and written review after each completed tutor session.
Display aggregated tutor ratings and reviews on the tutor profile view.
Enable students to rate room and equipment quality after use, contributing to a quality score.
Ensure all user data is encrypted in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest, complying with university data protection policy.
